dmca.title: Sex guide author complains of unauthorized reproduction
dmca.body:
Dear Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints:

I am contacting you to file a notice of Copyright Infringement.

1.	It has come to my attention that an unauthorized use of my copyrighted article titled "More Sex Tips" has appeared on several websites. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears at http://www.allsexguide.com/more_sex_tips.htm

In visiting the following webpages, it is clear that my article was simply copied and pasted into their website, word for word.

2.	Search Query: sex positions ann andriani 
Infringing Web Pages: http://www.idreamofporn.com/FrrumXXXv3/printthread.php?t=58


Search Query: sex tips ann andriani
Infringing Web Pages: http://www.idreamofporn.com/ForumXXXv3/printthread.php?t=58


3.	My contact information is the following:
[private](A.K.A. Ann Andriani and many years ago, Ann Ferrara) 
[private]
Bellport, NY 11713
Phone: [private]
Email: [private]@allsexguide.com

4.	Owners/Administrators of the allegedly infringing webpages:
http://www.idreamofporn.corn/ForumXXXv3/printthread.php?t=58
Administrative Contact:
[private]
I Dream of PORN
Private
Private, Ontario M2R 3G7
Canada
[private]@gmail.com

5.	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6.	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
Thank you very much for looking into this matter for me. Please feel free to contact me with any questions.

Sincerely
[private]
(A.K.A. Ann Andriani and years ago, Ann Ferrara)
